substeps.plaintext: Solve the Operable Mechanism puzzle to raise the gate to the lift and descend to the next floor.
substeps.markdown: Solve the ◀Operable Mechanism▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Operable_Mechanism▷ puzzle to raise the gate to the lift and descend to the next floor.

substeps.plaintext: Solve the Operable Mechanism: Lifting Column puzzle to the east and descend to the lower floor.
substeps.markdown: Solve the Operable Mechanism: Lifting Column puzzle to the east and descend to the lower floor.

substeps.plaintext: Solve the Energy Flow puzzle and return to the second floor from the Regulating Valve it connects to.
substeps.markdown: Solve the Energy Flow puzzle and return to the second floor from the Regulating Valve it connects to.

substeps.plaintext: Lead the Seelie to its Seelie Court to get access to the underwater area
substeps.markdown: Lead the Seelie to its Seelie Court to get access to the underwater area

substeps.plaintext: Go down to the underwater area under the main machine in the middle of the room.
substeps.markdown: Go down to the underwater area under the main machine in the middle of the room.

substeps.plaintext: Solve the Energy Flow puzzle and use the Xenochromatic Hunter's Ray to break the Fontemer Seagrass leading to the device, and Go Up twice.
substeps.markdown: Solve the Energy Flow puzzle and use the ◀Xenochromatic Hunter's Ray▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Xenochromatic_Hunter%27s_Ray▷ to break the Fontemer Seagrass leading to the device, and Go Up twice.
